subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Mucho Macho Man won the Breeders’ Cup World Championships title by a nose, but the day was also marked by a filly who broke her leg and was euthanized.
snippet: Mucho Macho Man won the Breeders’ Cup World Championships title by a nose, but the day was also marked by a filly who broke her leg and was euthanized.
